virophage.core

Class BonusCell

  • java.lang.Object
    • virophage.core.Cell
      • virophage.core.BonusCell
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BonusCell
extends Cell
implements java.io.Serializable
    A BonusCell is a space that is part of a series of bonus "regions". When a player takes an entire bonus region, he/she will have an upgrade - the time to update is halved.
    Since:
    2014-05-6
    Author:
    Leon Ren
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public BonusCell(Tissue tissue,

        Constructs a new bonus cell in a given Tissue at a given location.
